name: Fred the Frog (David Puffet)
description:
Fred the Frog is a 2.5D side-scrolling platformer in which you play as Fred. Help him travel the nearby gardens and forests, solve fun platforming puzzles, and explore all the secrets that this simple one-level-game has to offer! 

Controls:

A/D to walk

Spacebar to jump

R to stock out your tongue

E to attach/detach yourself from vines

W/S to climb up and down on vines
